entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:38 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 04:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
